name: Bunni and Kitty
description:
Bunni and Kitty

Summary:

A story about a little bunny who finds an abandoned kitty and takes her home. Shenanigans and cuteness ensues. 

Theme: Cute, light, fluffy

Developers Notes:

Bunni and Kitty was created during NaNoRenO month of 2011.  Originally it was supposed to be a small story, but like all of my projects, small projects turn to medium and large projects very quickly. The original concept was to make this story into a short comic strip. By chance, NaNoRenO month came around the corner and changed my mind. It was chaos making this game, but a fun chaos that showed me how much I could truly accomplish. I'm proud of my first published game.

The Making of Bunni and Kitty
